content: Folks in Sydney: I have arranged a B.O.F. meeting Thursday lunchtime to discuss issues or concerns relating to IG creation. Room to be announced -- check the meeting app for updated information.
@Mark Kramer Does the topic overlap with tonight's FHIR-I session or is there a different focus? https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179160-social/topic/Sydney.20Evening.20Schedule
different focus. Tonight is diving deep down into multi-language stuff
Mark is interested in the maintenance process

I don't know exactly what Grahame has in mind for tonight's session. It might overlap, but not everyone will fit in Grahame's AirBNB :) The BOF is to ask: As an IG Creator, what's working, what's not, and what changes to the process could make your life better?
I thought that this subject was on the list for lunch today
I am joining today's lunch for that
I am in the dark about today's lunch. On the app, there is a lunch in Cockle Bay Room. Is that it?

Lunch will provide some opportunity to talk about this, but there's a more limited time at lunch than most WGMs, longer distances for people to walk, and multiple topics to discuss. So having the carry-over slot Thur lunch is probably a good idea
@Mark Kramer Do we have a room for this?
